ygData.subject: RE: Instruments vs. Melee quandry
ygData.msgSnippet: aye i went and trained it when i first heard about it, and put some practice points in it, but no matter how many times i used the skill, i never saw an
ygData.messageBody:
aye i went and trained it when i first heard about it, and put some practice
points in it, but no matter how many times i used the skill, i never saw an
increase and it never scared anyone hehe. and yes the fear song is so much
better, and even though it is AE, it's range is not too dangerous.

Shada D'ukal, Level 50 Wood Elf Bard
Erisi Dlarit, Level 22 High Elf Paladin
Tyria, Level 13 High Elf Wizard
Mithaniel Marr Server


> On that topic I wanted to talk to my fellow 26+ bards
> about our level
> 26 skill, Instill Doubt. I have never heard this one
> discussed at all, most
> likely because our level 26 fear song is much better in
> accomplishing the
> job, but is there anyone out there who can share some
> experiences with this
> one?
